meta.p: Greetings to our Greenville and New Ipswich families. It is an honor to have been selected as your superintendent of schools. I am eternally grateful to the Board of School Committee for showing confidence in me, entrusting me with the educational lives of your children. I promise you my best work, with a relentless focus on doing great things for all of our learners. As I begin this new journey I intend on intensely listening to the needs of these two communities. The quality of your schools directly reflects on the quality of life all of you experience. I could not be more excited about this opportunity and am ready for the hard work.
All on Behalf of Our Children,

div.p:
04.27.2020 6:00 pm - 7:30 pm
Mascenic School Board Meeting
